00013 /*
00014  * Predict and Observe models
00015  *  These models extend, adapt and simpilify the fundamental Bayesian filter models
00016  *  Simple : Simplify model construction and use
00017  *  General: Combine model types to form more general models
00018  *  Adapted: Adapt one model type into another
00019  */

00026 typedef boost::function1<const FM::Vec&, const FM::Vec&> State_function;
00027 // A generalised function of state. Compatible with predict and observe models

00030 class Simple_addative_predict_model : public Addative_predict_model
00031 // Addative predict model initialised from function and model matricies
00032 {
00033     State_function ff;
00034 public:
00035     Simple_addative_predict_model (State_function f_init, const FM::Matrix& G_init, const FM::Vec& q_init);
00036     // Precondition: G, q are conformantly dimensioned (not checked)
00037 
00038     // No default assignment operator
00039 
00040     virtual const FM::Vec& f(const FM::Vec& x) const
00041     {   return ff(x);
00042     }
00043 };

00052

00120 class Adapted_Correlated_addative_observe_model : public Correlated_addative_observe_model
00121 /*
00122  * Adapt Uncorrelated_addative_observe_model to an equivilent
00123  * Correlated_addative_observe_model_adaptor
00124  */
00125 {
00126 public:
00127     Adapted_Correlated_addative_observe_model (Uncorrelated_addative_observe_model& adapt);
00128     const FM::Vec& h(const FM::Vec& x) const
00129     {
00130         return unc.h(x);
00131     }
00132     inline void normalise (FM::Vec& z_denorm, const FM::Vec& z_from) const
00133     {
00134         unc.normalise (z_denorm, z_from);
00135     };
00136 private:
00137     Uncorrelated_addative_observe_model& unc;
00138 };
00139 
00140 class Adapted_Linrz_correlated_observe_model : public Linrz_correlated_observe_model
00141 /*
00142  * Adapt Linrz_uncorrelated_observe_model to an equivilent
00143  * Linrz_correlated_observe_model
00144  */
00145 {
00146 public:
00147     Adapted_Linrz_correlated_observe_model (Linrz_uncorrelated_observe_model& adapt);
00148     const FM::Vec& h(const FM::Vec& x) const
00149     {
00150         return unc.h(x);
00151     }
00152     inline void normalise (FM::Vec& z_denorm, const FM::Vec& z_from) const
00153     {
00154         unc.normalise (z_denorm, z_from);
00155     };
00156 protected:
00157     Linrz_uncorrelated_observe_model& unc;
00158 };

00165 // General Linearised Uncorrelated Addative and Likelihood observe model
00166 class General_LzUnAd_observe_model : public Linrz_uncorrelated_observe_model, public Likelihood_observe_model
00167 {
00168 public:
00169     General_LzUnAd_observe_model (std::size_t x_size, std::size_t z_size) :
00170         Linrz_uncorrelated_observe_model(x_size, z_size),
00171         Likelihood_observe_model(z_size),
00172         li(z_size)
00173     {}
00174     virtual Float L(const FM::Vec& x) const
00175     // Definition of likelihood for addative noise model given zz
00176     {   return li.L(*this, z, h(x));
00177     }
00178     virtual void Lz (const FM::Vec& zz)
00179     // Fix the observation zz about which to evaluate the Likelihood function
00180     // Zv is also fixed
00181     {   Likelihood_observe_model::z = zz;
00182         li.Lz(*this);
00183     }
00184 private:
00185     friend class General_LiUnAd_observe_model;
00186     struct Likelihood_uncorrelated
00187     {
00188         Likelihood_uncorrelated(std::size_t z_size) :
00189             zInnov(z_size), Zv_inv(z_size)
00190         {   zset = false;
00191         }
00192         mutable FM::Vec zInnov; // Normailised innovation, temporary for L(x)
00193         FM::Vec Zv_inv;         // Inverse Noise Covariance given zz
00194         Float logdetZ;          // log(det(Z))
00195         bool zset;
00196         Float L(const Uncorrelated_addative_observe_model& model, const FM::Vec& z, const FM::Vec& zp) const;
00197         // Definition of likelihood for addative noise model given zz
00198         void Lz(const Uncorrelated_addative_observe_model& model);
00199     };
00200     Likelihood_uncorrelated li;
00201 };
00202

00209         Likelihood_observe_model(z_size),
00210         li(z_size)
00211     {}
00212     virtual Float L(const FM::Vec& x) const

00227 // General Linearised Correlated Addative and Likelihood observe model
00228 class General_LzCoAd_observe_model : public Linrz_correlated_observe_model, public Likelihood_observe_model
00229 {
00230 public:
00231     General_LzCoAd_observe_model (std::size_t x_size, std::size_t z_size) :
00232         Linrz_correlated_observe_model(x_size, z_size),
00233         Likelihood_observe_model(z_size),
00234         li(z_size)
00235     {}
00236     virtual Float L(const FM::Vec& x) const
00237     // Definition of likelihood for addative noise model given zz
00238     {   return li.L(*this, z, h(x));
00239     }
00240     virtual void Lz (const FM::Vec& zz)
00241     // Fix the observation zz about which to evaluate the Likelihood function
00242     // Zv is also fixed
00243     {   Likelihood_observe_model::z = zz;
00244         li.Lz(*this);
00245     }
00246 
00247 private:
00248     friend class General_LiCoAd_observe_model;
00249     struct Likelihood_correlated
00250     {
00251         Likelihood_correlated(std::size_t z_size) :
00252             zInnov(z_size), Z_inv(z_size,z_size)
00253         {   zset = false;
00254         }
00255         mutable FM::Vec zInnov; // Normailised innovation, temporary for L(x)
00256         FM::SymMatrix Z_inv;    // Inverse Noise Covariance
00257         Float logdetZ;          // log(det(Z)
00258         bool zset;  
00259         static Float scaled_vector_square(const FM::Vec& v, const FM::SymMatrix& V);
00260         Float L(const Correlated_addative_observe_model& model, const FM::Vec& z, const FM::Vec& zp) const;
00261         // Definition of likelihood for addative noise model given zz
00262         void Lz(const Correlated_addative_observe_model& model);
00263     };
00264     Likelihood_correlated li;
00265 };
